actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Chaos Pheromones
actions.desc: The khalkos emits a cloud of pheromones in a 20-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners. Each non-khalkos creature in the area makes a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw. Creatures with an alignment trait make this save with disadvantage. On a failure  the creature is confused for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on itself on a success. If the creature makes its saving throw or the condition ends for it  it is immune to Chaos Pheromones for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Psionic Sting
actions.desc: The khalkos targets a creature within 30 feet  forcing it to make a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw. On a failure  the target takes 28 (8d6) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Detect Alignment
special_abilities.desc: The khalkos can detect the presence of creatures within 30 feet that have an alignment trait, and knows the alignment of such creatures.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The khalkos has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
